fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicVariables: NY: number of real variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicAliasVariables: NA: number of alias variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfIntegerAlgebraicVariables: NYINT: number of alg. int variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfIntegerAliasVariables: NAINT: number of alias int variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfStringAlgebraicVariables: NYSTR: number of alg. string variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfStringAliasVariables: NASTR: number of alias string variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfBooleanAlgebraicVariables: NYBOOL: number of alg. bool variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfBooleanAliasVariables: NABOOL: number of alias bool variables, OMC

ScalarVariable.name: Off.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.activeSteps
ScalarVariable.description: Number of active steps in the CompositeStep

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.t
ScalarVariable.description: = actual waiting time (transition will fire when t > waitTime)

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.t_start
ScalarVariable.description: Time instant at which the transition would fire, if waitTime would be zero

ScalarVariable.name: Off.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: Off.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: On.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: On.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: Red.nIn
ScalarVariable.description: Number of input connections

ScalarVariable.name: Red.nOut
ScalarVariable.description: Number of output connections

ScalarVariable.name: $whenCondition2
ScalarVariable.description: Train_Passed_Sensor2_Activated and not Train_Passed_Sensor2

ScalarVariable.name: $whenCondition4
ScalarVariable.description: Gate_Angle <= 0.0

ScalarVariable.name: $whenCondition5
ScalarVariable.description: On.active or Off.active

ScalarVariable.name: $whenCondition6
ScalarVariable.description: Gate_Angle >= 90.0

ScalarVariable.name: Off.active
ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.name: Off.inPort[2].occupied
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: Off.localActive
ScalarVariable.description: = true if step is active, otherwise the step is not active

ScalarVariable.name: Off.newActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active in the next iteration

ScalarVariable.name: Off.oldActive
ScalarVariable.description: Value of active when CompositeStep was aborted

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.enableFire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if all firing conditions are true

ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: Off.inPort[1].set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is activated

ScalarVariable.name: Off.inPort[2].set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is activated

ScalarVariable.name: Off.outPort[1].available
ScalarVariable.description: true, if step is active

ScalarVariable.name: Off.outPort[1].reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step is deactivated

ScalarVariable.description: = true, if resume transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: Off.outerStatePort.subgraphStatePort.suspend
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if suspend transition of CompositeStep fires

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.condition
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire (time varying expression)

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.fire
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition fires

ScalarVariable.description: true, if step connected to the transition input is active

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.inPort.reset
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and the step connected to the transition input is deactivated

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.localCondition
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if transition may fire

ScalarVariable.description: true, if step connected to the transition output is active

ScalarVariable.name: OffToOn.outPort.set
ScalarVariable.description: true, if transition fires and step connected to the transition output becomes active
